SkyOreText.Default: The ground is glittering with cyan light.
SkyOreText.Translation: 地下闪耀着青色的光芒

IceOreText.Default: The ice caves are crackling with frigid energy.
IceOreText.Translation: 寒冷洞穴因寒气而噼啪作响

PlantOreText.Default: Energized plant matter has formed in the underground.
PlantOreText.Translation: 地下开始形成有活力的植物物质

TreeOreText.Default: Fossilized tree bark is bursting through the jungle's mud.
TreeOreText.Translation: 化石树皮在丛林的泥土中蔓延.

AuricOreText.Default: A godly aura has blessed the world's caverns.
AuricOreText.Translation: 虔诚的光芒祝福了这个世界的地下洞穴

FutureOreText.Default: A cold and dark energy has materialized in space.
FutureOreText.Translation: 一种冷而暗的能量在天空中出现了

UglyBossText.Translation: 灾厄的生物现在这个世界自由的游荡

UglyBossText2.Default: The ancient ice spirits have been unbound!
UglyBossText2.Translation: 古老的冰雕精华已经被释放了

SteelSkullBossText.Default: A blood red inferno lingers in the night...
SteelSkullBossText.Translation: 血红色的地狱在夜里徘徊……

BabyBossText.Default: A plague has befallen the Jungle.
BabyBossText.Translation: 瘟疫袭击了丛林里的生命

BabyBossText2.Default: An ancient automaton roams the land.
BabyBossText2.Translation: 一辆古老的机器在陆地上漫游

MoonBossText2.Translation: 宇宙的生物正在注视这个世界

PlagueBossText.Default: PLAGUE NUKE BARRAGE ARMED, PREPARING FOR LAUNCH!!!
PlagueBossText.Translation: 瘟疫导弹就绪，准备发射！！！！

PlagueBossText2.Translation: 导弹发射，自动瞄准启动！！！！

ProfanedBossText2.Default: Shrieks are echoing from the dungeon.

ProfanedBossText3.Default: The calamitous beings have been inundated with bloodstone.
ProfanedBossText3.Translation: 灾厄的生物被血石吞没了

GhostBossText.Default: The abyssal spirits have been disturbed.
GhostBossText.Translation: 深渊中的灵魂被惊醒了

SupremeBossText3.Default: Alright, let's get started.  Not sure why you're bothering.
SupremeBossText3.Translation: 你是谁，你...为什么会找到我，挑战我吗.......

SupremeBossText4.Default: You seem so confident...yet painfully ignorant of what has yet to transpire.
SupremeBossText4.Translation: 看来你很有自信，但你依然不知道能不能打败我。

SupremeBossText5.Default: Couldn't leave well enough alone could you?  Everything was going well until you came along.
SupremeBossText5.Translation: 为什么，你为什么要到这里

SupremeBossText6.Default: Brothers, could you assist me for a moment?  Dealing with this fool is growing tiresome.
SupremeBossText6.Translation: 为了阻止你，我只能这样做了.

SupremeBossText.Default: Don't worry, I still have plenty of tricks left.
SupremeBossText.Translation: 停！你这样做会唤醒他的，他一旦苏醒，这个世界必将再次陷入黑暗.

SupremeBossText7.Default: Hmm...perhaps I should let the little ones out to play for a while.
SupremeBossText7.Translation: 红月，为了阻止他，请助我一臂之力.

SupremeBossText8.Translation: 看样子，你很有可能会打败我

SupremeBossText20.Default: What!?  How are you still alive!?

SupremeBossText21.Translation: 跟他战斗，想过结果吗，和我一样，嗯？

SupremeBossText22.Default: Even if you defeat me you still have my lord to contend with!
SupremeBossText22.Translation: 你能战胜他，但是不是现在

SupremeBossText23.Default: To this day he has yet to lose a battle!
SupremeBossText23.Translation: 我知道他的实力，要不然你说我怎么会变成这样

SupremeBossText24.Default: Not even I could defeat him!  What hope do YOU have!?
SupremeBossText24.Translation: 我为了解除痛苦，多次与他战斗，但结果都一样

SupremeBossText25.Default: He has grown far stronger since we fought...I can't see you defeating him, at least not with your current strength.
SupremeBossText25.Translation: 自从他把我诅咒之后，他便越来越强大

SupremeBossText26.Default: Well...I guess this is the end...
SupremeBossText26.Translation: 嗯...我想，我也应该结束了

SupremeBossText27.Default: Perhaps one of these times I'll change my mind after all these deaths...
SupremeBossText27.Translation: 也许有一次我会在我死亡之后改变我的想法……

SupremeBossText28.Default: You aren't hurting as much as I'd like...are you cheating?
SupremeBossText28.Translation: 你打败了我，希望不是作弊吧

SupremeBossText29.Translation: 你的实力还不行，至少，我，可以当你的老师

SupremeBossText2.Translation: 当你凝视深渊的时候，深渊也在凝视你

SupremeBossText10.Default: At long last I am free...no...wait.  I'll just keep coming back, like you.  Funny how that works...isn't it?
SupremeBossText10.Translation: 终于要结束了，孩子，你的意志很强大

SupremeBossText11.Default: Do you enjoy going through hell?

SupremeBossText12.Default: Don't get me wrong, I like pain too, but you're just ridiculous.
SupremeBossText12.Translation: 别误会我，我也喜欢痛苦，但你只是一个笑话罢了

SupremeBossText13.Default: You must enjoy dying more than most people, huh?
SupremeBossText13.Translation: 如果你真的要挑战他的话，请一定要胜利

SupremeBossText14.Default: Do you have a fetish for getting killed or something?
SupremeBossText14.Translation: 你失败了，这个世界就玩完了

SupremeBossText15.Default: Alright, I'm done counting.  You probably died this much just to see what I'd say.
SupremeBossText15.Translation: 好吧，我知道了，你一定会胜利，我忠心的祝你好运

SupremeBossText16.Default: You didn't die at all huh?  Welp, you probably cheated then.  Do it again, for real this time...but here's your reward I guess.
SupremeBossText16.Translation: 至少，我还能再站，至少，这个世界还有希望

SupremeBossText17.Default: One death?  That's it? ...I guess you earned this then.
SupremeBossText17.Translation: 一死？是这样吗？……我想当时你可能就是这样赢的。

SupremeBossText18.Default: Two deaths.  Good job.  Here's your reward.
SupremeBossText18.Translation: 一起死亡.....干得好..这是你应得奖赏。

SupremeBossText19.Default: Third time's the charm huh?  I guess it is.  Here's a special reward.
SupremeBossText19.Translation: 第三次的魅力是什么？我想是的....这是一个特别的奖赏。

EdgyBossText.Translation: 骄傲只是一种弱者的表现罢了!

EdgyBossText7.Translation: 万物的一切尽在神的掌握之中

EdgyBossText8.Default: Are you honestly that bad at dodging?

EdgyBossText9.Default: Of all my segments to get hit by...

EdgyBossText10.Translation: 来吧，让我好好陪你玩玩

EdgyBossText11.Default: A GOD DOES NOT FEAR DEATH!

EdgyBossText12.Default: You are no god...but I shall feast upon your essence regardless!
EdgyBossText12.Translation: 万物之灵，必将我我的食物，哈哈哈哈哈哈哈

EdgyBossText13.Translation: 在强者眼里，没有弱者的席位

EdgyBossText17.Default: NO!  I AM THE ONE ABOVE ALL!  I WILL CONSUME YOUR UNIVERSE!
EdgyBossText17.Translation: 不！我是最重要的！弱肉强食本是这个世界的生存法则

DoGBossText2.Translation: 收获之月发出耀眼的光芒

AstralText.Default: A star has fallen from the heavens!
AstralText.Translation: 一颗彗星从宇宙深处掉落下来.....

AstralBossText.Default: The seal of the stars has been broken!  You can now mine Astral Ore!
AstralBossText.Translation: 彗星封印已解除！你可以开采星辉矿了！

DargonBossText2.Default: My dragon deems you an unworthy opponent.  You must acquire the power of the dark sun to witness his true power.
DargonBossText2.Translation: 我的龙认为你不配是它的对手。你必须获得黑暗太阳的力量来见证他的真正的实力

DargonBossText3.Default: My dragon deems you an unworthy opponent.  Snuff out the profaned flame and destroy the god devourer to witness his true power.
DargonBossText3.Translation: 我的龙认为你是不配是它的对手。熄灭亵渎的火焰，打败神明吞噬者，来见证他的真正的实力

DeathText.Default: Death is active, enjoy the fun.
DeathText.Translation: 死亡是必要的，主要享受的乐趣。

DeathText2.Default: Death is not active, not fun enough for you?
DeathText2.Translation: 死亡并不好玩，但对你来说不够有趣？

ArmageddonText.Default: Bosses will now kill you instantly.

ArmageddonText2.Default: Bosses will no longer kill you instantly.

DefiledText.Translation: 你的灵魂，现在由我来保管…

DefiledText2.Default: Your soul is yours once more...

FlameText.Default: The air is getting warmer around you.
FlameText.Translation: 你周围的空气越来越暖和了。

BossRushStartText.Default: Hmm?  Ah, another contender.  Very well, may the ritual commence!
BossRushStartText.Translation: 嗯？啊，另一个竞争者。很好，开始吧！

BossRushTierOneEndText.Default: Hmm?  Oh, you're still alive.  Unexpected and exhilarating, but don't get complacent just yet.
BossRushTierOneEndText.Translation: 嗯？哦，你还活着。意外和令人振奋，但不要自满。

BossRushTierTwoEndText.Default: Hmm?  Persistent aren't you?  Perhaps you have some hope of prosperity, unlike past challengers.
BossRushTierTwoEndText.Translation: 嗯？你不是执着吗？也许你有很大的希望，不像过去的挑战者。

BossRushTierThreeEndText.Default: Hmm?  Your perseverance is truly a trait to behold.  You've come further than even the demigods in such a short time.
BossRushTierThreeEndText.Translation: 嗯？你的毅力确实很让人震惊。在这么短的时间里，你甚至比半神还要强大。

BossRushTierThreeEndText2.Default: May your skills remain sharp for the last challenges.
BossRushTierThreeEndText2.Translation: 愿你的武器在最后的挑战中保持锋利。

BossRushTierFourEndText.Default: Hmm?  So you've made it to the final tier, a remarkable feat enviable by even the mightiest of the gods.
BossRushTierFourEndText.Translation: 嗯？所以你已经到达了最后一关，一个连最强大的神都羡慕的非凡壮举。.

BossRushTierFourEndText2.Default: Go forth and conquer 'til the ritual's end!
BossRushTierFourEndText2.Translation: 前进，征服，直到挑战结束！

BossRushTierFiveEndText.Default: Hmm?  You expected a reward beyond this mere pebble?  Patience, the true reward will come apparent in time...
BossRushTierFiveEndText.Translation: 嗯？你在期待着什么奖励吗？保持耐心，真正的奖励会在不久后到来……
